abstract: For President Obama, the announcement of the U.S. troop withdrawal was a campaign promise fulfilled, for Ambassador James Jeffrey it was an encouraging sign, for the Iraqi politician Ahmad Chalabi it was expected.
snippet: For President Obama, the announcement of the U.S. troop withdrawal was a campaign promise fulfilled, for Ambassador James Jeffrey it was an encouraging sign, for the Iraqi politician Ahmad Chalabi it was expected.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

lead_paragraph: BAGHDAD - In the years before coming to Iraq to cover the American withdrawal, I was a sports reporter and several times covered games in which players, managers and coaches experienced stunning defeats.

headline.main: In Iraq, Diplomatic Perspectives on a Deal Not Made
